content.title: Configuring Services for Edit Recipients
content.body:
1. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Condition section, select If.
  2. Modify the following fields:
    • First Field: Navigated From
    • Select Source: select frmDetails > btnEdit > onClick
  3. From the Action Editor left menu, under the Network section, select Invoke Service.
  4. From the right pane of the Action Editor, select the following values from the drop-down lists.
    • Select Service: RecipientStorage$Recipients
    • Select Method: get
